from morphforge.morphology.core import Region


[docs]class Targeter(object):


[docs]    def __init__(self, priority, **kwargs):
        super(Targeter,self).__init__(**kwargs)
        self.priority = priority



[docs]    def get_priority(self):
        return self.priority
        #raise NotImplementedError()



[docs]    def does_target_section(self, section):
        raise NotImplementedError()



[docs]    def get_description(self):
        raise NotImplementedError()




[docs]class PassiveTargetterEverywhereDefault(Targeter):


[docs]    def __init__(self, priority=0, **kwargs):
        super(PassiveTargetterEverywhereDefault, self).__init__(priority=priority,**kwargs)



[docs]    def does_target_section(self, section):
        return True



[docs]    def get_description(self):
        return 'Default'




[docs]class PassiveTargetterEverywhere(Targeter):


[docs]    def __init__(self, priority=5, **kwargs):
        super(PassiveTargetterEverywhere, self).__init__(priority=priority, **kwargs)



[docs]    def does_target_section(self, section):
        return True



[docs]    def get_description(self):
        return 'Everywhere'




[docs]class PassiveTargetterRegion(Targeter):


[docs]    def __init__(self, region, priority=10, **kwargs):
        super(PassiveTargetterRegion, self).__init__(priority=priority, **kwargs)
        self.region = region



[docs]    def does_target_section(self, section):
        return section.region == self.region



[docs]    def get_description(self):
        return 'Passive-Region:%s' % self.region.name







[docs]class ChannelTargeterEverywhere(Targeter):

[docs]    def __init__(self, priority=10, **kwargs):
        super(ChannelTargeterEverywhere,self).__init__(priority=priority, **kwargs)




[docs]    def does_target_section(self, section):
        return True



[docs]    def get_description(self):
        return 'Everywhere'




[docs]class ChannelTargeterRegion(Targeter):


[docs]    def __init__(self, region, priority=20, **kwargs):
        super(ChannelTargeterRegion, self).__init__(priority=priority, **kwargs)
        assert isinstance(region, Region)
        self.region = region




[docs]    def does_target_section(self, section):
        return section.region == self.region



[docs]    def get_description(self):
        region_name = self.region.name
        return 'Region: %s' % region_name




[docs]class ChannelTargeterSectionPath(Targeter):


[docs]    def does_target_section(self, section):
        assert False



[docs]    def get_description(self):
        return 'MM-SectionPath: ??'




[docs]class ChannelTargeterSection(Targeter):


[docs]    def __init__(self, section, priority=40, **kwargs):
        super(ChannelTargeterSection, self).__init__(priority=priority, **kwargs)
        self.section = section




[docs]    def does_target_section(self, section):
        return self.section == section



[docs]    def get_description(self):
        if self.section.idtag:
            section_desc = self.section.idtag
        else:
            section_desc = '[No idtag]'
        return 'Section: %s' % section_desc
